concept.title: 237.102-78 MARKET RESEARCH REPORT GUIDE FOR IMPROVING THE TRADECRAFT IN SERVICES ACQUISITION.

conbody.p: See PGI 210.070 for guidance on use of the market research report guide to conduct and document market research for service acquisitions.
